item.title: Adding Unit Tests to Legacy C Code with GTest and FFF
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Some background on jargon used in this article Selecting the sample C app Base App Why can’t the code be tested now? What’s the problem with putting it into a test harness now? The road to a compiling test harness A simple demo with FFF mocking library calls Unit testing a function with no library API calls Introduction The main purpose of this article is to show a concrete example of how to take some legacy software written in C and add unit tests into the project using GTest and fff.
